overview: Based on Maks Velo’s novel, a famous Albanian artist, architect and writer. Maks Velo was sentenced to 10 years in prison in 1978 for "agitation and propaganda" against the communist regime in Albania, in the Spaç labor camp. The artist returns to visit the camp after the fall of communist regime and wrote his reflections about his feelings on the novel "The sheets were missing".
title: The White Sheets
